forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: similar effect to the "affecting" attribute?

comments.text: i've been wanting to fully recreate something specific from manylans for a while now, but can't seem to get an effect like the one in manyland.
for those who haven't seen it, it's basically a coloured filter on top of the screen that softly appears and fades within a second.

thread.latestCommentText: for those who haven't seen it, it's basically a coloured filter on top of the screen that softly appears and fades within a second.
